title: Composite hydrogels based on deep eutectic solvents and lysine for pressure sensors and adsorption of Fe3+
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25359-25368
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04397A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yajun Jiang, Aolin Wu, Lin Yang, Jun Wu, Yue Liang, Zhigang Hu, Ying Wang
This study explored the preparation of a novel composite hydrogel based on deep eutectic solvent (DES) with lysine (Lys) and its application in pressure sensing and Fe3+ adsorption.
